title: Phishing Scam on Facebook
description: Beware of phishing attempts on Facebook. Scammers may send fake messages pretending to be from trusted sources.

title: Investment Scam via Email
description: Watch out for investment scams sent through email. Always verify the sender's credibility before investing.

title: Instagram Phishing Scam
description: Scammers may use Instagram to trick users into giving away sensitive information. Stay vigilant and report suspicious activity.

title: WhatsApp Investment Scam
description: Be cautious of investment offers received through WhatsApp. Verify the legitimacy of the opportunity before committing.

title: Phishing Scam via Call
description: Stay alert for phishing calls where scammers pose as legitimate entities to extract personal information. Never share sensitive details over the phone.

title: Facebook Investment Scam
description: Scammers may use Facebook to promote fraudulent investment schemes. Exercise caution and research thoroughly before investing.

title: SMS Phishing Scam
description: Be wary of SMS messages containing links or requests for personal information. These could be phishing attempts aimed at stealing your data.
